about_the_game:
The festive preparations for the big event organized by Pornocrates have begun.
People from all corners of the world are invited to participate in a sexual tournament where the prize will be a small fortune.
However, it is necessary to win a preliminary eliminatory test, which will be held in the libidinous city that she leads.
Pornocrates is a mysterious sexual entity. She is a goddess of pleasure and sex who enjoys promoting sex championships in the most exotic places in the world. Guests will have the chance to live an experience similar to a wet dream. Such a dream is full of explicit sex, pornography, and absolute pleasure.
All characters must be nude or wear the minimum amount of clothing necessary. However, you need to know that there are several traps and puzzles to deal with. On top of all this, there is a hidden enemy who wants to harm Pornocrates' sex business.



Now, there is a first level that will take Pornocrates' story to another level. The player will need to manage her presence in her city without being eliminated. Because he will need to win if he wants to join her party on the other levels.
Some puzzles need to be deciphered and traps need to be avoided. Otherwise, the player will not win.
Pornocrates herself will interact with the participants, something she never did during her big challenge.
Her suggestions could be very useful. However, you need to be very careful with it. In other words, it could put the player in an embarrassing situation or face a major failure.
The original Pornocrates game has been completely remade from scratch and these fixes will also be available (remember that the bug fixes from the original edition will be available for those who do not purchase this DLC).


This game is based on Félicien Rops's painting: A woman in profile, haughty, dressed only in black stockings adorned with a vertical row of pink and red flowers, held up by blue garters, long black gloves, golden bracelets, a wide golden belt with a big blue bow, a blue necklace, blue earrings, a black feathered hat, two white roses in her hair and a white veil headband. The woman can be seen as a powerful female and your hog. The pig with a golden tail can also be seen as an allegory for luxury.
"Pornography is purely and simply a description of carnal pleasures; eroticism is the same revalued description, based on an idea of love or social life. Everything that is erotic is also necessarily pornographic" ~ Self-definition of Queen Pornocrates.



This DLC contains an extra gameplay aspect. You will be able to talk to Pornocrates whenever you find a puzzle in the shape of a painting. The narrative structure is very simple, very similar to a visual novel within a first-person game. The objective is to create a feeling of intimacy with a peculiar and extremely mysterious character.
Playing is extremely easy because you can use your computer's keyboard and mouse or you can choose a joystick.
During the game, you can:
Collect items are hidden in the mansion.
Protect yourself from attacks.
Read messages and save them in inventory to review later,

content_descriptors.notes: “The characters are practically naked or half-naked. Frequent nudity, because the characters live in a sexual world where they survive with what they can. The game has some situations of explicit and non-explicit sex. Sexual content is explicit or graphic...”

name: Pornocrates' Feast

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-750, 2.67 GHz | AMD
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics, NVIDIA 600 Series, AMD 7000 Series
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7, 2.67 GHz
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2070 Series or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 9 GB available space

short_description: The erotic and festive preparations for the Huge Sexual Challenge organized by Pornocrates have begun. People from all corners of the world are invited to participate in an explicit sexual tournament where the prize will be a small fortune. Do you want to apply?
